title: King of Fighters: Another Day
synopsis: The four episodes are set in Southtown, the imaginary city well known to all fans as the stage of numerous death matches throughout the KOF series. Many past heroes of the saga make their appearance here, and the four plots intertwine to create a large-scale drama, that is also linked to the story of KOF Maximum Impact 2.
related_anime: ['Fatal Fury: The Motion Picture', 'Battle Spirits: Ryuuko no Ken', 'Fatal Fury 2: The New Battle', 'The King of Fighters XV', 'The King of Fighters: Destiny', 'Fatal Fury: Legend of the Hungry Wolf']
